channel.title: Design Evolution eBook
channel.description:
A few weeks ago I read a little book by Josh Long - [Design Evolution][1] - and liked it so much I posted a [review on my blog][2]. Was just sending the link to someone who asked me a question and thought it might be a useful read for people here.
*Disclaimer: I've written for Five Simple Steps before in the Pocket Guide Series, which is why I read the book in the first place but not why I recommend it!*
[1]: http://www.fivesimplesteps.com/products/design-evolution [2]: http://www.rachelandrew.co.uk/archives/2013/06/28/book-review-design-evolution/
